remarks.format: ## Remarks 會啟用 選項的控制項，例如 和 屬性。The enables the control of options, such as the and properties. 這裡有些屬性只能使用該類別的建構函式來設定。Some of these properties can be set only using the constructor of the class. 此時您可以使用 方法取代 。In that case, the can be replaced using the method. 如需資料合約的詳細資訊，請參閱[使用資料合約](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md)。For more information about data contracts, see [Using Data Contracts](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-data-contracts.md). 如需有關使用取代傳回屬性，請參閱[資料合約 Surrogate](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md)。For more information about using the to replace the returned by the property, see [Data Contract Surrogates](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/data-contract-surrogates.md). ## Examples 下列範例會在行為集合中尋找作業的 ，並重設 和 屬性。The following example finds the in the collection of behaviors for an operation and resets the and properties.
